name: Kevin Miller
content: Deal Scale's AI Texting has revolutionized how I reach motivated sellers. The AI's ability to personalize messages and have initial conversations filters out the noise and gets me talking to serious prospects faster.
problem: Cold calling was time-consuming with low contact rates. Generic SMS blasts were ignored. I needed a scalable way to have personalized initial contact.
solution: The AI text outreach gets high open and response rates. The AI handles the first few messages, qualifies them, and I only step in for warm leads. It's like having an army of texters working for me.
